select-by-device.caption: WINC3400 BLE SDK and Wi-Fi Host Driver v1.1.0
select-by-device.info: The Atmel SmartConnect WINC3400 is an IEEE 802.11 b/g/n/BLE4.0 IOT network controller SoC. It is the ideal add-On to existing MCU solutions bringing WiFi and BLE Network capabilities through SPI-to-WiFi interface. The WINC3400 connects to Atmel AVR or SMART MCU's with minimal resource requirements.
